title: VITA | United Way of Florida
text: VITA: Free tax return preparation for qualifying taxpayers VITA (Volunteer Income Tax Assistance) is an IRS program that utilizes certified volunteers to help provide free and accurate tax preparation services to low- to moderate-income taxpayers. These services are provided at a variety of public locations such as libraries, schools, and neighborhood centers in certain high-need areas. VITA has been instrumental in helping ALICE (Asset Limited, Income Constrained, Employed) households receive thousands of dollars in additional refunds. For all the details on VITA services and to find a VITA site near you, click here.
